title: What can I do if the Bluetooth headset does not fit my ears?
answer:
We have provided you with three headset covers. You can choose one based on your own ear size. Put on your headset and rotate headset to adjust it to the position where the headset can properly fit your ears. Generally, the microphone should face toward your mouth. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=47358)
